FROM ubuntu:15.10

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y curl && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

# Install nvm
RUN touch .profile
RUN curl -f -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/creationix/nvm/v0.30.2/install.sh | bash
